tagBITMAP_HEADER Struct Reference

#include <usb_io.h>

Public Attributes

T_REPORT_ID reportID
INT8U layer
INT8U originX
INT8U originY
INT8U bReserved [4]

Detailed Description

Origin must be (X,y) where X = n * 8 where 0<=n<=((LCD_WIDTH/8) - 1).

(In other words X must begin on an even byte boundary.)
Ex: 


  0,8,16,...n*8
